      • WebQQClient

        public WebQQClient(String username,
                   String password,
                   QQNotifyListener notifyListener,
                   QQActorDispatcher actorDispatcher)
        构造方法，初始化模块和服务 账号/密码 监听器 线程执行器
        参数:
        username - a String object.
        password - a String object.
        notifyListener - a QQNotifyListener object.
        actorDispatcher - a QQActorDispatcher object.
